title: Great medical center location
posting_body: Medical Center Apartments is an extraordinary place to call home.
Now under new management, our vibrant apartment community is transforming into an exciting new image, inviting a sophisticated level of class for an elevated living experience.

Our one- and two-bedroom apartments in Houston, TX  are pet-friendly, and provide professionals with easy access to the medical gateway of surrounding hospitals and the Texas Medical Center, as well as nearby hot spots for fun and relaxing downtime.

From an impressive variety of spacious floor plans to an upgraded amenities package with a refined touch, you’ll appreciate our above-and-beyond approach to offering an affordable, quality home that perfectly fits your lifestyle.
